meanings.definition: Not relating to or believing in a religion.
meanings.sent1: She preferred a nonreligious approach to spirituality.
meanings.sent2: Many of her friends are nonreligious and do not attend church.
meanings.sent3: The nonreligious cat refused to worship the laser pointer.
meanings.sent4: His nonreligious view of the world was like seeing in grayscale.
meanings.sent5: The nonreligious garden was filled with science books instead of religious symbols.

meanings.sent1: The nonreligious community center welcomed everyone regardless of faith.
meanings.sent2: He considered himself nonreligious but respected others' beliefs.
meanings.sent3: The nonreligious squirrel hoarded acorns instead of prayers.
meanings.sent4: Her nonreligious perspective on life was like a clear sky without clouds.
meanings.sent5: The nonreligious library was a haven for those seeking knowledge beyond religion.
